mapper.insert: INSERT INTO charge_order ( order_no, in_record_id, amount, pay_status, pay_channel, pay_time, out_time, fee_rule_name, create_time ) VALUES ( #{orderNo}, #{inRecordId}, #{amount}, #{payStatus}, #{payChannel}, #{payTime}, #{outTime}, #{feeRuleName}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT id, order_no, in_record_id, amount, pay_status, pay_channel, pay_time, out_time, fee_rule_name, create_time, update_time FROM charge_order WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT id, order_no, in_record_id, amount, pay_status, pay_channel, pay_time, out_time, fee_rule_name, create_time, update_time FROM charge_order WHERE in_record_id = #{inRecordId} AND out_time = #{outTime}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM charge_order
AND pay_status = #{payStatus}
